resources.string: Cancelled transfer
For transferring files using Bluetooth and WLAN
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check both devices' WLAN and Bluetooth connections."
"Couldn't connect. Reconnect to WLAN and try again."
"Couldn't connect. Reconnect to WLAN on both devices and try again."
"Couldn't connect. Reconnect to WLAN on both devices and try again."
To be able to use this feature, grant Xiaomi Share all the required permissions in the Settings.

Cancelled transfer
The other person cancelled the transfer
Cancelled transfer
Cancelled outgoing transfer
"Xiaomi Share won't work when dual Wi-Fi is on. Turn off dual Wi-Fi in the Settings and try again."
"Xiaomi Share won't work when dual WLAN is on. Turn off dual WLAN in the Settings and try again."

Turn on Xiaomi Share on both devices
"If you can't find the device you need, ask the other person to turn on Xiaomi Share."
Xiaomi Share turned on location services to find devices nearby
File Manager > Xiaomi Share
Notifications about Xiaomi Share processes

"Xiaomi Share allows you to send items wirelessly to other nearby devices. This feature is supported by OPPO, vivo, realme, and other smartphone manufacturers. You can check the list of supported devices on the official website of any selected brand."
Turn on Xiaomi Share automatically
Turn Xiaomi Share back on automatically when Bluetooth or Wi-Fi are turned back on
Turn Xiaomi Share back on automatically when Bluetooth or WLAN are turned back on
Notifications about items sent and received by Xiaomi Share

To connect the devices, WLAN and Bluetooth should be turned on on the other device too. Check whether connection for the other device is allowed in Settings > Connection & sharing > Connected devices and try again.
"You can turn on Xiaomi Share in your device's Control center."
Xiaomi Share is off
To connect the devices, turn on WLAN and Bluetooth on this device first. Turn on now?
"Couldn't connect to computer. Make sure you've turned on WLAN and Bluetooth on both your mobile device and computer, and that your computer is running Xiaomi PC Manager."
Turn on WLAN and Bluetooth
Allow Xiaomi Share to discover and connect to nearby devices for it to be able to transfer files.
Grant the required permissions to be able to use Xiaomi Share
"'%1$s' copied to clipboard."
Authorisation

"Welcome to Xiaomi Share! You can use this app to transfer files between devices. We protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and policies. Before using Xiaomi Share, you must grant the following permissions, as well as allow it to collect the necessary personal information:"
Welcome to Xiaomi Share! You can use this app to transfer files between devices.
Withdrawing consent to the Privacy Policy will also turn off Xiaomi Share
For best results, use a 5 GHz WLAN network.
Xiaomi Share will turn off automatically in %d minutes

string.name: transfer_to_pc_summary_new_plus
string.Data: Xiaomi PC Manager now supports Xiaomi Share! You can find a list of supported computer models here.

resources.string: "Turn on Xiaomi Share using the toggle in the Notification shade. After that, you'll be able to see nearby devices when you start sharing a photo or a file. Tap the recipient's device to send the item you're sharing."
Turn on Xiaomi Share in Control center to be able to easily send and receive items. After turning it on, you can share items with nearby devices for %d minutes before it turns off automatically.

"Turn on Xiaomi Share using the toggle in the Notification shade. After that, you'll be able to see nearby devices when you start sharing a photo or a file. Tap the recipient's device to send the item you're sharing."
Turn on Xiaomi Share in Control center to be able to easily send and receive items. After turning it on, you can share items with nearby devices for %d minutes before it turns off automatically.
"If you can't find the target device, ask the other person to tap the Xiaomi Share toggle in their Control center."
Ask the other person to turn on Xiaomi Share
Beam uses UWB technology to recognise target devices wirelessly. Once the target device is recognised, its icon will come to the foreground.
Beam uses UWB technology to recognise target devices wirelessly. Transferring items between devices powered by UWB technology is faster and more convenient.
"Make sure both devices' screens are on and they have WLAN and Bluetooth turned on."
Turn on WLAN first

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Xiaomi Share. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As Xiaomi Share provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept Xiaomi Share services."
